reasoning: Autoimmune neuromuscular disorder with incidence ~1.0 per 100k person-years globally. Based on population-based epidemiological studies showing 0.5-2.0 per 100k depending on region.
source: Phillips LH 2nd et al. (2004). The epidemiology of myasthenia gravis. Ann N Y Acad Sci. 998:407-412
